verses.kjv: I AM the man that hath seen affliction by the rod of his wrath.
verses.web: I am the man who has seen affliction by the rod of his wrath.
verses.ct: I am the man who has experienced suffering under the rod of his wrath.

verses.kjv: He hath led me, and brought me into darkness, but not into light.
verses.web: He has led me and caused me to walk in darkness, and not in light.
verses.ct: He has led me and driven me into darkness instead of light.

verses.kjv: Surely against me is he turned; he turneth his hand against me all the day.
verses.web: Surely he turns his hand against me again and again all day long.
verses.ct: He keeps turning his hand against me, over and over, all day long.

verses.kjv: My flesh and my skin hath he made old; he hath broken my bones.
verses.web: He has made my flesh and my skin old. He has broken my bones.
verses.ct: He has worn away my flesh and skin. He has shattered my bones.

verses.kjv: He hath builded against me, and compassed me with gall and travail.
verses.web: He has built against me, and surrounded me with bitterness and hardship.
verses.ct: He has built siege works against me, surrounding me with bitterness and hardship.

verses.kjv: He hath set me in dark places, as they that be dead of old.
verses.web: He has made me dwell in dark places, as those who have been long dead.
verses.ct: He has made me live in darkness, like those who died long ago.

verses.kjv: He hath hedged me about, that I cannot get out: he hath made my chain heavy.
verses.web: He has walled me about, so that I can’t go out. He has made my chain heavy.
verses.ct: He has walled me in so I can't escape. He has weighed me down with heavy chains.

verses.kjv: Also when I cry and shout, he shutteth out my prayer.
verses.web: Yes, when I cry, and call for help, he shuts out my prayer.
verses.ct: Even when I cry out and beg for help, he shuts out my prayer.

verses.kjv: He hath inclosed my ways with hewn stone, he hath made my paths crooked.
verses.web: He has walled up my ways with cut stone. He has made my paths crooked.
verses.ct: He has blocked my path with walls of cut stone and twisted every road I try to take.

verses.kjv: He was unto me as a bear lying in wait, and as a lion in secret places.
verses.web: He is to me as a bear lying in wait, as a lion in secret places.
verses.ct: He has been like a bear lying in ambush, like a lion hiding and waiting to strike.

verses.kjv: He hath turned aside my ways, and pulled me in pieces: he hath made me desolate.
verses.web: He has turned away my ways, and pulled me in pieces. He has made me desolate.
verses.ct: He dragged me off my path and tore me apart. He left me with nothing.

verses.kjv: He hath bent his bow, and set me as a mark for the arrow.
verses.web: He has bent his bow, and set me as a mark for the arrow.
verses.ct: He drew his bow and made me the target for his arrows.

verses.kjv: He hath caused the arrows of his quiver to enter into my reins.
verses.web: He has caused the shafts of his quiver to enter into my kidneys.
verses.ct: He shot the arrows from his quiver deep into my body.

verses.kjv: I was a derision to all my people; and their song all the day.
verses.web: I have become a derision to all my people, and their song all day long.
verses.ct: I've become a joke to all my people — they mock me in song all day long.

verses.kjv: He hath filled me with bitterness, he hath made me drunken with wormwood.
verses.web: He has filled me with bitterness. He has stuffed me with wormwood.
verses.ct: He has filled me with bitterness and forced me to drink wormwood until I'm drowning in it.

verses.kjv: He hath also broken my teeth with gravel stones, he hath covered me with ashes.
verses.web: He has also broken my teeth with gravel. He has covered me with ashes.
verses.ct: He has ground my teeth against gravel and pressed my face into the ashes.

verses.kjv: And thou hast removed my soul far off from peace: I forgat prosperity.
verses.web: You have removed my soul far away from peace. I forgot prosperity.
verses.ct: You have stripped all peace from my soul. I've forgotten what it feels like to prosper.

verses.kjv: And I said, My strength and my hope is perished from the LORD:
verses.web: I said, “My strength has perished, along with my expectation from LORD.”
verses.ct: So I said, "My strength is gone, and so is every hope I had from the LORD."

verses.kjv: Remembering mine affliction and my misery, the wormwood and the gall.
verses.web: Remember my affliction and my misery, the wormwood and the bitterness.
verses.ct: Remember my suffering and my misery — the wormwood and the bitterness.

verses.kjv: My soul hath them still in remembrance, and is humbled in me.
verses.web: My soul still remembers them, and is bowed down within me.
verses.ct: My soul keeps replaying it all, and I am crushed inside.

verses.kjv: This I recall to my mind, therefore have I hope.
verses.web: This I recall to my mind; therefore I have hope.
verses.ct: But then I call this to mind, and it gives me hope:

verses.kjv: It is of the LORD’s mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not.
verses.web: It is because of LORD’s loving kindnesses that we are not consumed, because his compassion doesn’t fail.
verses.ct: It is only because of the LORD's mercy that we haven't been completely destroyed, because his compassion never fails.

verses.kjv: They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness.
verses.web: They are new every morning. Great is your faithfulness.
verses.ct: His mercies are brand new every morning. Great is your faithfulness!

verses.kjv: The LORD is my portion, saith my soul; therefore will I hope in him.
verses.web: “LORD is my portion,” says my soul. “Therefore I will hope in him.”
verses.ct: "The LORD is all I have," my soul declares. "That's why I will put my hope in him."

verses.kjv: The LORD is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him.
verses.web: LORD is good to those who wait for him, to the soul who seeks him.
verses.ct: The LORD is good to those who wait for him, to the soul that seeks him.

verses.kjv: It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the LORD.
verses.web: It is good that a man should hope and quietly wait for the salvation of LORD.
verses.ct: It is good to hope and wait quietly for the salvation of the LORD.

verses.kjv: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
verses.web: It is good for a man that he bear the yoke in his youth.
verses.ct: It is good for a person to bear the yoke while still young.

verses.kjv: He sitteth alone and keepeth silence, because he hath borne it upon him.
verses.web: Let him sit alone and keep silence, because he has laid it on him.
verses.ct: Let him sit alone in silence, because the LORD has laid it on him.

verses.kjv: He putteth his mouth in the dust; if so be there may be hope.
verses.web: Let him put his mouth in the dust, if it is so that there may be hope.
verses.ct: Let him press his face to the dust — there may still be hope.

verses.kjv: He giveth his cheek to him that smiteth him: he is filled full with reproach.
verses.web: Let him give his cheek to him who strikes him. Let him be filled full of reproach.
verses.ct: Let him offer his cheek to the one who strikes him. Let him accept the full weight of disgrace.

verses.kjv: For the LORD will not cast off for ever:
verses.web: For the Lord will not cast off forever.
verses.ct: For the Lord will not reject anyone forever.

verses.kjv: But though he cause grief, yet will he have compassion according to the multitude of his mercies.
verses.web: For though he causes grief, yet he will have compassion according to the multitude of his loving kindnesses.
verses.ct: Even though he brings grief, he will show compassion because his mercy is so great.

verses.kjv: For he doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.
verses.web: For he does not afflict willingly, nor grieve the children of men.
verses.ct: He doesn't enjoy afflicting people or bringing sorrow to anyone.

verses.kjv: To crush under his feet all the prisoners of the earth,
verses.web: To crush under foot all the prisoners of the earth,
verses.ct: When prisoners are crushed underfoot,

verses.kjv: To turn aside the right of a man before the face of the most High,
verses.web: to turn away the right of a man before the face of the Most High,
verses.ct: when someone's rights are denied before the face of the Most High,

verses.kjv: To subvert a man in his cause, the LORD approveth not.
verses.web: to subvert a man in his cause, the Lord doesn’t approve.
verses.ct: when justice is twisted against a person — the Lord does not approve of these things.

verses.kjv: Who is he that saith, and it cometh to pass, when the Lord commandeth it not?
verses.web: Who is he who says, and it comes to pass, when the Lord doesn’t command it?
verses.ct: Who can speak something into existence unless the Lord commands it?

verses.kjv: Out of the mouth of the most High proceedeth not evil and good?
verses.web: Doesn’t evil and good come out of the mouth of the Most High?
verses.ct: Don't both disaster and blessing come from the mouth of the Most High?

verses.kjv: Wherefore doth a living man complain, a man for the punishment of his sins?
verses.web: Why does a living man complain, a man for the punishment of his sins?
verses.ct: Why should any living person complain when they're being punished for their own sins?

verses.kjv: Let us search and try our ways, and turn again to the LORD.
verses.web: Let us search and try our ways, and turn again to LORD.
verses.ct: Let us examine and test our ways, and turn back to the LORD.

verses.kjv: Let us lift up our heart with our hands unto God in the heavens.
verses.web: Let’s lift up our heart with our hands to God in the heavens.
verses.ct: Let us lift up our hearts and our hands to God in the heavens.

verses.kjv: We have transgressed and have rebelled: thou hast not pardoned.
verses.web: “We have transgressed and have rebelled. You have not pardoned.
verses.ct: "We have sinned and rebelled, and you have not pardoned us.

verses.kjv: Thou hast covered with anger, and persecuted us: thou hast slain, thou hast not pitied.
verses.web: “You have covered us with anger and pursued us. You have killed. You have not pitied.
verses.ct: You wrapped yourself in anger and hunted us down. You killed without pity.

verses.kjv: Thou hast covered thyself with a cloud, that our prayer should not pass through.
verses.web: You have covered yourself with a cloud, so that no prayer can pass through.
verses.ct: You hid yourself behind a cloud so thick that no prayer could reach you.

verses.kjv: Thou hast made us as the offscouring and refuse in the midst of the people.
verses.web: You have made us an off-scouring and refuse in the middle of the peoples.
verses.ct: You have made us nothing but garbage and filth among the nations."

verses.kjv: All our enemies have opened their mouths against us.
verses.web: “All our enemies have opened their mouth wide against us.
verses.ct: All our enemies have opened their mouths wide against us.

verses.kjv: Fear and a snare is come upon us, desolation and destruction.
verses.web: Terror and the pit have come on us, devastation and destruction.”
verses.ct: Terror and traps have overtaken us — devastation and destruction everywhere.

verses.kjv: Mine eye runneth down with rivers of water for the destruction of the daughter of my people.
verses.web: My eye runs down with streams of water, for the destruction of the daughter of my people.
verses.ct: Rivers of tears pour from my eyes over the destruction of my people.

verses.kjv: Mine eye trickleth down, and ceaseth not, without any intermission,
verses.web: My eye pours down and doesn’t cease, without any intermission,
verses.ct: My tears flow without stopping, without any relief,

verses.kjv: Till the LORD look down, and behold from heaven.
verses.web: until LORD looks down, and sees from heaven.
verses.ct: until the LORD looks down and sees us from heaven.

verses.kjv: Mine eye affecteth mine heart because of all the daughters of my city.
verses.web: My eye affects my soul, because of all the daughters of my city.
verses.ct: What I see breaks my heart — the fate of all the women of my city.

verses.kjv: Mine enemies chased me sore, like a bird, without cause.
verses.web: They have chased me relentlessly like a bird, those who are my enemies without cause.
verses.ct: My enemies hunted me relentlessly, like a bird, for no reason at all.

verses.kjv: They have cut off my life in the dungeon, and cast a stone upon me.
verses.web: They have cut off my life in the dungeon, and have cast a stone on me.
verses.ct: They threw me into a pit to die and sealed it with a stone.

verses.kjv: Waters flowed over mine head; then I said, I am cut off.
verses.web: Waters flowed over my head. I said, “I am cut off.”
verses.ct: Water rose over my head, and I thought, "This is the end for me."

verses.kjv: I called upon thy name, O LORD, out of the low dungeon.
verses.web: I called on your name, LORD, out of the lowest dungeon.
verses.ct: I called on your name, LORD, from the depths of that pit.

verses.kjv: Thou hast heard my voice: hide not thine ear at my breathing, at my cry.
verses.web: You heard my voice: “Don’t hide your ear from my sighing, and my cry.”
verses.ct: You heard my voice — don't close your ears to my gasping, to my desperate cry!

verses.kjv: Thou drewest near in the day that I called upon thee: thou saidst, Fear not.
verses.web: You came near in the day that I called on you. You said, “Don’t be afraid.”
verses.ct: You came close the day I called out to you. You said, "Don't be afraid."

verses.kjv: O LORD, thou hast pleaded the causes of my soul; thou hast redeemed my life.
verses.web: Lord, you have pleaded the causes of my soul. You have redeemed my life.
verses.ct: LORD, you took up my case. You fought for me and saved my life.

verses.kjv: O LORD, thou hast seen my wrong: judge thou my cause.
verses.web: LORD, you have seen my wrong. Judge my cause.
verses.ct: LORD, you have seen the injustice done to me. Stand as my judge.

verses.kjv: Thou hast seen all their vengeance and all their imaginations against me.
verses.web: You have seen all their vengeance and all their plans against me.
verses.ct: You have seen how they've taken revenge on me and all their schemes against me.

verses.kjv: Thou hast heard their reproach, O LORD, and all their imaginations against me;
verses.web: You have heard their reproach, LORD, and all their plans against me,
verses.ct: You have heard their insults, LORD, and all their plots against me —

verses.kjv: The lips of those that rose up against me, and their device against me all the day.
verses.web: the lips of those that rose up against me, and their plots against me all day long.
verses.ct: the constant whispering of my attackers and their schemes against me all day long.

verses.kjv: Behold their sitting down, and their rising up; I am their musick.
verses.web: You see their sitting down and their rising up. I am their song.
verses.ct: Watch them — whether they sit or stand, I am the butt of their mocking songs.

verses.kjv: Render unto them a recompence, O LORD, according to the work of their hands.
verses.web: You will pay them back, LORD, according to the work of their hands.
verses.ct: Pay them back, LORD, for what their hands have done.

verses.kjv: Give them sorrow of heart, thy curse unto them.
verses.web: You will give them hardness of heart, your curse to them.
verses.ct: Give them hardened hearts — let your curse fall on them.

verses.kjv: Persecute and destroy them in anger from under the heavens of the LORD.
verses.web: You will pursue them in anger, and destroy them from under the heavens of LORD.
verses.ct: Pursue them in anger and wipe them out from under the LORD's heavens.
